data.name: I Just Want to be Single!!
data.detailed_description:
A dating sim where you avoid cute babes instead of dating them?!

You are Aya - a timid, anxiety ridden mess that wants nothing more than to start fresh in your final year of high school. New school, new people, making friends will DEFINITELY work this time! But in a strange twist of fate, it turns out your new haircut is making everyone in class fall in love with you instead?!
How will you make new friends with cute girls that are looking for more than just friendship?

Survive highschool

You don't want to graduate highschool without a single friend, but become too close with someone and they just might want more than friendship! You'll need to balance your affection level in order to avoid getting heartbreak or heartache!




Key Features:

  • A Love-Meter that keeps track of your affection level with all characters!
  • LGBTQIA+: Play as a non-binary, ace/aro protagonist! Cast featuring lesbian, bi, trans characters and more
  • Animated Manga Cutscenes with Voice Acting
  • Original art and soundtrack nostalgic of mid 2000's Anime and Manga
  • Minigames
  • A lot of jokes. No really, there's like... five of them
  • Multiple unique endings where you date, or befriend each girl, or all of them at the same time! (And more)
  • Actually good pacing. No, really. I don't like reading
  • Secrets. But I can't tell you what they are. Unless you bribe me.
  • You can't date a skeleton in this game :(
  • You can pet the dog though.

data.short_description: The anti-dating sim where you make friends instead of girlfriends! Balance between heartbreak and heartache! Will you graduate without a single friend? Or will you survive long enough to reject them all?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Michaelsoft Binbows
  • Processor: Optimus Prime
  • Memory: 9001 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 144p
  • Sound Card: Pot of Greed
  • Additional Notes: Why are you reading this

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac-aroni and Cheese X
